idea:
Castlecraft is a software technology design company focused on building robust, scalable & reliable new-age software solutions.

We started our journey by contributing & building an Open source ERP system named ERPNext and we still continue to enhance the core ERP system. 

We love to solve real-world customer business problems with software tools like Microservices, Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD pipeline, REST API / Webhook, Business Intelligence, and more. 

Our software architecture distributes business functions over craft cloud services with independent app upgrade capabilities with Zero downtime.

We wisely choose the right software stack suitable for the use case keeping scalability and adaptability in mind.

Read more on the customer use case on scalability ;  https://www.castlecraft.in/2020/12/07/scale-erpnext-custom-development-on-kubernetes/
name: CASTLECRAFT ECOMMERCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To carry on the business as tourist agents and contractors and to facilitate traveling and to provide for tourists and travelers, the provision of the convenience of all kinds in the way of through tickets, sleeper cars, or berths, reserved places, hotel, motel and lodging, accommodation guidance, safe deposits, inquiry bureaus, libraries, reading rooms, baggage transport, and other allied services.

idea:

idea:
Today’s digital world is dominated with social media connections, and some of the most memorable interactions occur with strangers over the internet. However, when they want to come together for an activity or trip, the planning, communication, timing and transactions becomes almost impossible to manage.

A group of innovative and creative individuals are developing a platform called ‘POM and Go’ which seeks to enable social experiences for groups of people who want to stitch an Experience Together.

 is a startup based in Mumbai and Atlanta which is innovating a completely new buying experience in groups.

We enable you to actualise your social groups’ intentions and wishes to Experience Together physical activities in a seamless manner
name: POM AND GO PRIVATE LIMITED
